name: Fall Armyworm
symptoms: Small holes in leaves, windowing effect, frass (excrement) on leaves, damage to whorl and tassel
control: Use biological control (parasitoids), apply Bt-based insecticides, practice crop rotation, early planting, use resistant varieties

name: Tuta absoluta
symptoms: Mines in leaves, galleries in stems, damage to fruits, leaf wilting
control: Use pheromone traps, biological control (parasitoids), apply spinosad-based insecticides, remove and destroy infested plants

name: Aphids
symptoms: Curled leaves, sticky honeydew, sooty mold, stunted growth
control: Use neem oil, introduce beneficial insects (ladybugs), apply insecticidal soap, remove heavily infested plants
